paragraphs.body:
I would like to point out that there is a rules on the Wiki that we are not allowed to respond on Old Month comments and for example: like this one and this one. Does anyone else agree?
-- King Marth 64  (talk • other wikis • blogs) http://i1116.photobucket.com/albums/k576/DigiPen92/25px-Marthsprite.gif   http://i1116.photobucket.com/albums/k576/DigiPen92/Luigidance.gif 20:57, August 12, 2011 (UTC)
